author: poojaranjan
content:
**EIPIP Meeting 75**
Date and Time: Feb 22, 2023 at 16:00 UTC
Agenda: https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/issues/213

author: poojaranjan
content: We have started on the onboarding. A public announcement of  two new editors (1 ERC & 1 Core) will be going out tomorrow on ECH Twitter and a followed announcement in the EIPIP meeting. A recent PR updates this on EIP-1 https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/6528

author: poojaranjan
content:
Appreciate the offer to help the process as an ERC editor. 
We understand the issue of time zone, thus there is a proposal added to tomorrow's agenda for a different meeting time. If you have got any proposal for time as well as if you'd like to formally propose your name for ERC Editor, please add a comment to the agenda and it can be discussed.

author: poojaranjan
content:
Most of the EIP discussion happens in #eip-editors of ECH Discord. Here is the invite link 
https://discord.io/EthCatHerders
